titleStmt.title: J. P. Sparks et al. to Beriah Magoffin
CWG11301

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Petitions for Pardons and Remissions, 1859-1862

body.p:
To his excellency B. Magoffin governor of the Commonwealth of Kentucky, Most Respectfully Petition and Request you to Remit a fine of $17 60/100 Against Geo. T. Sparks of Henry County Ky. Rendered before a justice of the peace for a Breech of the peace, no person or persons being damaged or injured in any particular Materially, We have the Honor -- to be yours Petitioners Most Respectfully
April 12th 1862

J. P. Sparks
Jas. W. McCornell
Jno. D. Gardner
Jno Long
David Shipman
J Adams
Jno Holland
Geo M Hill
John M Henderson
Milton Adams
J. W. OBannon
C. Ireland
R C Lindsay
J D Baker
John Jones
J B
H. C. Ireland
Robt Montgomery
Wally B
Jacob MÃ¼nch
G Threlkeld
N B Ireland
W M Threlkeld
Wm Tyler
